attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allowing'STEVIA' a NATURAL PLANT SUGAR to be imported and used into this country without the interference and medelling  'Big Sugar Companies' who lobbied against it's introduction here! It would also help OBESE people to charter a new course into a healthier diet as 'STEVIA' has no ill effects on Teeth or diet as it's very low in Carbs

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
